original_text: Moreover Jeremiah said unto king Zedekiah, What have I offended against thee, or against thy servants, or against this people, that ye have put me in prison?
korean_text: 예레미야가 다시 시드기야 왕에게 이르되 내가 왕에게나 왕의 신하에게나 이 백성에게 무슨 죄를 범하였기에 나를 옥에 가두었나이까

sentences.original_text: Moreover Jeremiah said unto king Zedekiah
What have I offended against thee
that ye have put me in prison
sentences.korean_translation: 당신들이 나를 감옥에 가둔 이유가 무엇입니까
